类 Word

  • java.lang.Object
    • a4_40018813_part1.Word
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Comparable<Word>

    public class Word
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Word>
    Word class, which implements Comparable interface also use generic to compare two objects from Word class
    作者:
    Rui Zhao
